ru.yandex.yandexmapkit.overlay.location
Class MyLocationItem

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ru.yandex.yandexmapkit.overlay.OverlayItem
        |
        +--ru.yandex.yandexmapkit.overlay.location.MyLocationItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
public class MyLocationItem
extends OverlayItem

MyLocationItem.java: Renders an overlay that represents a user location on the map. By default the overlay is rendered at the center of the user location area, and the balloon (if present) is rendered above it.

This file is a part of the Yandex Map Kit.

Version for Android Â© 2011 YANDEX

getRradius

public int getRradius()
Returns the accuracy radius.
Returns:

getSpeed

public float getSpeed()
Returns the user speed.
Returns:
the user speed (in m/s)

getBearing

public float getBearing()
Returns the azimuth of the user's movement, in degrees. The azimuth is calculated as the angle between North and the direction the user is traveling (clockwise).
Returns:
the azimuth of the user's travel (in degrees)

getType

public int getType()
Returns the type of location data being received (GPS or LBS).
Returns:
1 - GPS, 2 - LBS

getTime

public long getTime()
Returns the GPS time, if using GPS connection.
Returns:
Gps time
